name: Generate > Phishing Alert
description: Generate Demo Alert for Suspicious Email

resource.name: Suspicious Email: Urgent: Requesting CEO Level Demo Environment
resource.emailBody: Hey Team, We stand to win some Bitcoins if we can demonstrate our software on http://demo.gumblar.cn/ Cheers, Raj
resource.emailSubject: Urgent: Requesting CEO Level Demo Environment
resource.reporterEmailBody:
CyberSec team – please can you investigate the attached suspicious email we have received.

We don’t have anybody name Shiv or Raj in the organization, and moreover, the return address seems to be the spoofed domain.
